works.title: Reddit Saved Posts Organizer
works.description: A browser extension for Chrome and Firefox that loads the user's saved posts from reddit and lets you organize in folders.

works.title: Mikkeller prototype challenge
works.description: 10 hours of programming resulting in a high fidelity prototype of an app made to the Danish beer company Mikkeller.

works.title: Slide to confirm Flutter package
works.description: A customizable slider that will activate a callback when the user slides it to 100%. This is a package for Flutter.

works.title: Minimalistic bottom navigation Flutter package
works.description: A minimalistic bottom navigation package for Flutter. It is highly customizable and features smooth animations.

works.title: Interactive map of Denmark
works.description: An interactive map of Denmark made with Java and JavaFX as part of the course "First-year Project: Map of Denmark. Visualization, Navigation, Searching, and Route Planning" at ITU. Made in collaboration with four classmates.

works.title: Point counter for Davoserjas
works.description: A mobile app for keeping track of the score while playing the Danish card game "Davoserjas". The app is created in the cross-platform framework Flutter, but is only published for Android phones.
